issue.title: Build SplitSync (Expense Sharing App)
issue.body:
# Product Requirements Document: SplitSync (Expense Sharing App)
**Version:** 2.0 (Enhanced for Robustness & CI/CD)
**Target:** Production-Ready MVP
**Deployment Strategy:** Dockerized Node.js Server (VPS/Railway/Fly.io) due to SQLite + Socket.io constraints.

---

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript (strict mode)
- SQLite + better-sqlite3
- Drizzle ORM
- Zod validation
- NextAuth.js v5
- Socket.io
- Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- React Hook Form
- Vitest
- GitHub Actions CI/CD

---

## Key Features
1. Group management with invite links
2. Expense tracking with equal splits
3. Settlement algorithm (debt graph simplification)
4. Real-time updates via Socket.io
5. OAuth (Google) + Credentials auth
6. Docker deployment with persistent volumes

---

## Robustness Requirements
- All money stored as integers (cents)
- Atomic transactions for financial data
- Zod validation on all inputs
- TypeScript strict mode (no `any` types)
- CI/CD pipeline with lint, typecheck, tests, and build

---

**Note:** 14th attempt. Auto-merge fix VERIFIED in attempts #12-13 (commits a615307, issue #397). PRs with Copilot COMMENTED reviews now auto-merge successfully. Continuing to build SplitSync app.
